title: Ghostwatch (1992) + bonus "Shooting Reality"
description:
I wanted a better-quality version of this, so I muxed the best AC3 audio I had with video I ripped myself.  Bear in mind that, as a 1992 BBC television special, the video quality was not the best to begin with.  Also included, as a bonus, is the "Shooting Reality" making-of short from the BFI DVD.

Format:  Matroska
Video:  H264  768x576  4:3  3983 Kbps  25fps
Audio:  AC3  44 KHz  320 Kbps  Stereo
